evidence.claim: The Susan Samueli Integrative Health Institute utilizes AWS and Azure for their cloud-based services.
They mention implementing FHIR standards for interoperability in their health data exchanges.
Integration with EHR systems is supported as part of their patient care initiatives.
The Institute adheres to HL7 standards for health information exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction handling or API automation use cases found.
